channel.title: HELP! Error's runing source after compiling
channel.description:
Ok, i can change thing's that i dont have to use my compiler for, then when i change thing's i must compile for, the compiler works, but when i open : 2. Run server --> it tell's me i have all these problems. Let me show you what i do.
I start off with my source (and this has happened with the other 5 sources i have) i go to (C:\Users\NiggerTrippen\Desktop\HyBriD PvP Source\Source HyBriD PvP) i click: 2. Run Server open's with this: [url=http://gyazo.com/6718fa85495becac4792534249f58fc5]http://gyazo.com/6718fa85495becac4792534249f58fc5[/url]
Then i go do something like changing NpcDrops.tsm and change drop rates, go comepile (with no problems) [url=http://gyazo.com/4ef04712bf7808c1c8945723f3f06309]http://gyazo.com/4ef04712bf7808c1c8945723f3f06309[/url]
Then immidiantly after compiling i go to open: "2. Run Server" it give's me this: [url=http://gyazo.com/4c96ffc0719de052df5cb7757302a045]http://gyazo.com/4c96ffc0719de052df5cb7757302a045[/url]
Extra Information: Java's: [url=http://gyazo.com/71c08b19123e2a513e12f4cbfcaefd52]http://gyazo.com/71c08b19123e2a513e12f4cbfcaefd52[/url]
"Compiler" Code:
@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause
"2. Run Server" Code
@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
Please Help

item.title: HELP! Error's runing source after compiling
item.dc:creator: @zemptai zemptai
item.description:
@zemptai wrote:

Ok, i can change thing’s that i dont have to use my compiler for, then when i change thing’s i must compile for, the compiler works, but when i open :
2. Run server --> it tell’s me i have all these problems.
Let me show you what i do.

I start off with my source (and this has happened with the other 5 sources i have)
i go to (C:\Users\NiggerTrippen\Desktop\HyBriD PvP Source\Source HyBriD PvP)
i click: 2. Run Server
open’s with this:
http://gyazo.com/6718fa85495becac4792534249f58fc5

Then i go do something like changing NpcDrops.tsm and change drop rates, go comepile (with no problems)
http://gyazo.com/4ef04712bf7808c1c8945723f3f06309

Then immidiantly after compiling i go to open: “2. Run Server”
it give’s me this: http://gyazo.com/4c96ffc0719de052df5cb7757302a045

Extra Information:
Java’s: http://gyazo.com/71c08b19123e2a513e12f4cbfcaefd52

“Compiler” Code:

@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe” -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\world\map*.java
pause

“2. Run Server” Code

@echo off
title Project Insanity
java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

Please Help

Read full topic
item.source: HELP! Error's runing source after compiling
